contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox kommune | name = Rømskog | native_name = | native_name_lang = | other_name = | official_name = | idnumber = 0121 | image_skyline = | county = Østfold | district = Smaalenene | capital = Rømskog | language = [[Bokmål]] | coatofarms = Rømskog komm.svg | demonym = Rømsking | munwebpage = www.romskog.kommune.no | mayor = Nils Nilssen | mayor_party = [[Norwegian Labour Party|Ap]] | mayor_as_of = 2007 | area_rank = 340 | area_total_km2 = 183 | area_land_km2 = 159 | area_water_percent = 0.06 | population_as_of = 2008 | population_rank = 420 | population_total = 649 | populationpercent = 0.01 | population_density_km2 = 4 | population_increase = 4.5 | latd = 59 | latm = 42 | lats = 52 | longd = 11 | longm = 48 | longs = 31 | utm_zone = 32V | utm_northing = 6622962 | utm_easting = 0657989 | geo_cat = adm2nd }} '''Rømskog''' is a [[Municipalities of Norway|municipality]] in [[Østfold]] [[Counties of Norway|county]], [[Norway]]. The administrative centre of the municipality is the village of Rømskog. The new municipality of Rømskog was separated from [[Rødenes]] on 1 January 1902. [[Slavasshøgda]] is a hill in Rømskog and is the highest point in Østfold county at {{convert|336|m|ft|0}}. ==General information== ===Name=== The [[Old Norse]] form of the name was ''Rymsskógr''. The first element is the [[genitive case]] of the name of the [[lake]] ''Rymr'' (now [[Rømsjøen]]) and the last element is ''skógr'' which means "[[wood]]" or "[[forest]]". The meaning of the name ''Rymr'' is unknown. ===Coat-of-arms=== The [[Coat of arms|coat-of-arms]] is from modern times. They were granted on 22 July 1983. The arms show a pair of silver [[logging]] [[tongs]] on a blue background. Since [[forestry]] is the main source of income for the municipality, it was considered an appropriate symbol.<ref>{{cite web|author=Norske Kommunevåpen|year=1990|title=Nye kommunevåbener i Norden|url=http://www.ngw.nl/int/nor/r/romskog.htm|accessdate=2008-12-15}}</ref> {{See also2|Coat-of-arms of [[Nord-Odal]]}} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{commonscat-inline|Rømskog}} *{{wti|Rømskog}} *[http://www.ssb.no/english/municipalities/0121 Municipal fact sheet] from [[Statistics Norway]] *{{wikivoyage|Østfold}} {{Østfold}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Romskog}} [[Category:Municipalities of Østfold]] [[Category:Villages in Østfold]] [[Category:Rømskog| ]]
